title: 服务器加热力服务器崩溃
author: Muppet
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-6 14:49 编辑 

如题，以下是崩溃报告，求大神给解决办法
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 16-2-6 下午2:57
Description: Exception in server tick loop

Missing Mods:
        Forge : [10.13.3.1448,10.14)

cpw.mods.fml.common.MissingModsException
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.sortModList(Loader.java:258)

        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:176)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:620)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: Big-Time
replies.txt_content:
Muppet 发表于 2016-2-9 15:07
为什么自己下载的就用不了呢？
自己下载的没有修改内部，闪客联盟的他修改的可以用于服务器

replies.author: Big-Time
replies.txt_content: 是热力膨胀么？是的话，建议你把闪客联盟的热力膨胀拿来用，不然自己下载的根本用不了

replies.author: Muppet
replies.txt_content:
